Author: Shiddyfardy
Text: It seems like uncontrollable binge eating tends to follow long bouts of very restrictive eating :/ I'm sorry dear, I know it sucks.   All success stories I've heard about combatting binge eating have started with healing the restrictive relationship with food first. If you're not comfortable with trying that yet, that is perfectly okay, but I do recommend reading 'brain over binge'. I dont agree with everything in the book but it was a little helpful for me.
